products.title: Nobis Softshade Walnut Brown Day And Night Blind
products.description: Enjoy optimum light levels whatever youre doing at home with this convenient adjustable window covering. If youre looking for privacy you can enjoy it without completely shutting your blinds with the nobis softshade walnut brown day and night roller blind. The striped design features voile panels to let light in, whilst the brown polyester fabric panels work to shade your windows. This day and night roller blind features coffee brown fabric strips for a warm and classic feel. products.description: Their range of infusion solar pleated blinds is an excellent alternative to a venetian or roller blind.
